roleset.name: work together for nefarious purposes

example.name: it's a conspiracy
example.text: He was scheming with the United States.

example.name: all args. Let's hope she doesn't weigh the same as a duck.
example.text: Steven schemed with him to come to their town and rid them of the witch.
example.arg: to come to their town and rid them of the witch
